title: Grinding to Gold
body: Hey just looking for someone or multiple someones to help me grind to gold, voice is welcome at silver 3 atm

replies.body:
got a g3 account and a bronze 2 acc
i can help you climb out will start playing in 2-3h 
B2 DG AU2K1N6
G3 DV ARJAY

if you're good at adc i can hop on my smurf and duo with you i just got my account to S iV just playing Promos im happy to leave it on silver but gives me an excuse to keep playing on it :D , If you're interested add Gordons Here
Rages and calls me a flamer and a troll. RIP
You trolled and flamed our whole team, left your adc to go troll other lanes, top doesnt need a raka stealing his exp and you handicapped our mid fizz who was actually winning his lane
Welcome to low elo boys, where OCE haven't got a clue on macro understanding.
